column2: Lou Malnati's was the highly touted deep dish spot that we wanted to try. I don't know what it was when we went.. If it was too busy
column4: or for some reason that escapes me
column5: but our experience was less than par that left a sour taste in my mouth. The wait was expected
column6: but what wasnt was the seating of multiple 4 tops before my party even though we clearly put our name down first. It was only until I went inside and ask the hostess about it was when we finally got a table. Maybe it was really coincidental that our table just came up when I decided to ask
